name: Happy Cut - Split Same Size
description:
In every level, there is a rule or irregular shape, you just need to cut it into equal two or four slices. The more close the area of the slice is, easier it is to pass the level.

The real challenge is to cut perfectly equal slices! Let's see how many Perfects you can receive!

The difficulty of the game is gradual. To challenge the higher difficulty level, complete the simple level in front.
